application.doc: Retrieve the remote syslog forwarding sources

method.name: GET
method.id: Retrieve the remote syslog forwarding sourcesDocker
method.doc: The system provides the ability to forward entries from local log files to a remote syslog server. To retrieve the list of potential log file sources issue a HTTP GET request against the remote syslog forwarding sources resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

response.doc: 200 OK Content-Type:application/json [ "sources": ["LMI messages","LMI trace","Runtime messages","Runtime trace", "Runtime Logs", "WebSEAL", "Policy Server", "Embedded User Registry", "System", "DSC"] ]

param.name: sources
param.doc: The name of a log file source.

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
